'''''Fontaine Expects That Everyone Will Do Their Duty''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. 

To obtain this achievement, the player must complete the {{Quest|The Lone Phantom Sail}} and {{Quest|Kingdom Through the Looking-Glass}}, and then submit the [[Green Feather Accessory]] to the crate near the shipwreck on the coastline of the [[West Slopes of Mont Automnequi]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The shipwreck can be found on the west coast of the [[West Slopes of Mont Automnequi]].

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement alludes to a famous signal sent by British naval officer {{w|Horatio Nelson, 1st Viscount Nelson}} before the {{w|Battle of Trafalgar}}: "{{w|England expects that every man will do his duty}}."
